name: Birthday Balloons
description:
GREETING CARD
Product code: VB01

Hot air balloons 'happy birthday' card designed with linocut prints & fabric collage.

170mm x 120mm and blank inside for your personal message.

Printed and hand-packed in the UK on 100% post-consumer waste recycled paper (300gsm) using vegetable based inks. Comes complete with a 100% recycled light brown envelope.

10% of your online purchase will be donated to PEN International.
